oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We seek to explain the large T = 0 intercept of the normal-state NMR relaxation rate of Cu nuclei in cuprate superconductors by T = 0 local quantum fluctuations in the S = 1/2 Heisenberg model. Good quantitative agreement is obtained at both low and high T with published experimental results.
